pack(byte[], int) - Method in class domain.StatVar
Packs a StatVar into an array of byte at a specific position.
packBoolean(boolean, byte[], int) - Static method in class utils.PackUtils
Writes a boolean in the given position of the given byte array.
packChar(char, byte[], int) - Static method in class utils.PackUtils
Writes a char in the two bytes starting at the given position of the given byte array.
packDouble(double, byte[], int) - Static method in class utils.PackUtils
Writes a double in the eight bytes starting at the given position of the given byte array.
packFloat(float, byte[], int) - Static method in class utils.PackUtils
Writes a float in the four bytes starting at the given position of the given byte array.
packInt(int, byte[], int) - Static method in class utils.PackUtils
Writes a int in the four bytes starting at the given position of the given byte array.
packLimitedString(String, int, byte[], int) - Static method in class utils.PackUtils
Writes, al most, the first maxLenght characters of the String starting at the given position in the given array.
packLong(long, byte[], int) - Static method in class utils.PackUtils
Writes a long in the eight bytes starting at the given position of the given byte array.
PackUtils - Class in utils
This class provides static methods for packing and unpacking some primitive types (char, int, long and double) and Strings (limiting their maximum length).
PackUtils() - Constructor for class utils.PackUtils
 
Player - Class in domain
This class represents the info we have about a player: its number its name stats about her advanced distance stats abous her advanced distance per game
